content: 8th st 54sts 10 incr in every 9th st 60sts 11 single_crochet around in the front loop only 60sts 12 single_crochet around in the back loop only 60sts 13 single_crochet around 60sts -pin the eyes in the head -sew a v-shape with black colored yarn between the eyes picture 14 decrease every 9th and 10th st together 54sts 15 decrease every 8th and 9th st together 48sts 16 decrease every 7th and 8th st together 42sts 17 decrease every 6th and 7th st together 36sts 18 decrease every 5th and 6th st together 30sts 19 decrease every 4th and 5th st together 24sts 20 decrease every 3th and 4th together 18sts 21 decrease every 2d and 3d st together 12sts 22 -stuff the doll with fiberfill 23 decrease around 6sts 24 finish off with a slip_stitch 25 sew the gap pincers 2 will be worked in continual rounds of single_crochet you may like to use a stitch marker start with red colored yarn 1 magic loop 6sts 2 single_crochet around 6sts 3 incr in every 2d st 9sts 4 single_crochet around 9sts 5 incr in every 3d st 12sts 6 incr in every 4th st 15sts 7 single_crochet for 4 rounds 15sts 8 decrease every 4th and 5th st together 12sts 9 decrease every 3d and 4th st together 9sts 10 single_crochet for 5 rounds 9sts -stuff the pincer with some fiberfill 11 finish off with a slip_stitch and sew the gap horizontally 12 sew the pincer on the crab s body legs 6 will be worked in continual rounds of single_crochet you may like to use a stitch marker start with red colored yarn 1 magic loop 6sts 2 incr in every 2d st 9sts 3 single_crochet for 5 rounds 9sts 4 finish off with a slip_stitch -stuff the pincer with some fiberfill 5 sew the gap horizontally 6 sew the leg on the crab s body i hope you liked this doll and it came out fine also if you have more questions don t hesitate to contact me on my ravelry account and i ll try to answer you as soon as i can pattern designed by yarnyard
